reviewText:
This product was a disappointment.  There were too many black outs and we could never finish veiwing a disc.  Never was able to completely view the disc.  Notified the seller and returned the product.  I haven't heard from them at all.  No refund which was confirmed and never rec'd.
What a rip off.

Video quality was not HD....however it was very acceptable.  The only problem were that the subtitles, they were not very well done.  Parts of sentences were missing or parts of sentences would flash on screen for one or two frames...so fast that it could not be read....not a huge problem.  Those who are into Korean Dramas would enjoy despite the minor problems with the subtitles.
Some of the episodes were missing. The quality is pretty good, not pleased with missing episodes. So far, and I haven't finished watching, there has been 3.
je regarde quelques pisodes a la tlvision, je beaucoup aime, trs intressant, a montre un autre faon de vivre et comprendre..

I ordered this Item because of my wife special demand and appeal for it. The packaging was intact and everything was okay only to discover upon watching that NO ENGLISH SUBTITLE. Returning the item is not an option because of the cost involved but I believe this Review Platform is the avenue that I have to show my DISPLEASURE.

Amazon should have a verification unit to verify claims of their vendors.

SO SAD!
Love this one is this first drma I've have watch and fell in love with KDrama.
It was well worth the cost. Only thing was in one spot the music sound those not audible and the darn logo kept popping out. For the most part it was very good.
Very well done and a great movie, second only to Jumong.  Excellent series and the actress that played Dong Yi was excellent.
